text: No sred' lyudey takiye yest', Kotoryye berut sebe dlya pochitan'ya Drugikh s Allakhom naravne I lyubyat ikh, kak dolzhno im lyubit' Allakha, - I vse zh bezmerno vyshe etoy Lyubov' u pravednykh k Allakhu. I yesli by nevernyye prozreli, Oni, poistine, uvideli by karu I osoznali by, chto lish' Allakh, Poistine, mogushch nad vsem, (chto sushche), I v nakazanii surov
